content.description:
Hike in from the Willey Slide parking area, cross the Saco River and hike uphill through the woods to reach this slab.  

  Once at the slab, follow the line of least resistance upward, at about 5.4 in difficulty. 

  To the left of the Lost & Found Slab is a smaller slab. Two aluminum framed packs filled with backpacking gear were found at the base of this slab while descending from the FA of Lost & Found Slab.
content.location:
Hike in from the Willey Slide parking area, cross the Saco River and hike uphill through the woods to reach this slab.  

  I'm guessing this is the most prominent slab to the left of the "Far Left Slab." Finding the remnants of the aluminum framed backpacks would solve the mystery!

content.description:
This 350 foot slab is about directly across the road from the Willey Slide parking area. 

  Hike in from the Willey Slide parking area, cross the Saco River and hike uphill through the woods to reach this slab.  

  To the left of the Lost & Found Slab is a smaller slab where two aluminum framed packs filled with backpacking gear were found in the summer of 1980.
